comments:
To reproduce:

- Import the attached log file
- Open it in the log view
- Click on the Find Log Record button.  Notice that an NPE is thrown.  This only happens for the attached log file:

Created an attachment (id=52352)
Patch

The attached patch makes a modification on line 206 of LogRecordSearch.  The lookForStartNodeIndex method always assumed that a CBE log file contained a globalInstanceId, but according to the CBE spec (http://www-128.ibm.com/developerworks/autonomic/books/fpy0mst.htm#Header_103) this is an optional property.  I've changed it such that it compares the acutal objects rather than their globalInstanceIds.  Eugene, could you please review this and let me know if you see any issues with comparing the objects instead of the globalInstanceIds?

The patch looks good to me.

Thanks Navid for quickly resolving this!
Fix checked into HEAD with Christophe's approval.
